Description:
Job SummarySenior Data Quality Assurance Analyst’s main focus will be around designing Data Quality policies, standards and best practices and making sure they’re enforced within assigned data domain. Senior Data Quality Assurance Analyst’s will also communicate to various stakeholders in business to define, document and implement Data Quality rules to help monitor and enhance key Data Quality metrics.Key AccountabilitiesDevelop Data Quality policies and standards
Document Data Quality rules
Implement Data Quality checks using Data Quality Platform and other technologies
Investigate Data Quality incidents in order to find root cause and address it to right team
Develop Data Quality reporting and monitoring
Make sure Data Quality KPI’s are met within assigned domain
Work with Source system owners, Project Management Office, Data Team and others to ensure Data Quality incidents are resolved
Work with Data Team, Project Management Office, IT, Ops and Business to make sure Data Quality Policies are met
Promoting Data Quality standards and best practices across teams like Data Engineering, Business Intelligence, Regulatory Reporting, Ops and Business teams
Communicate with Data Owners and Data Consumers in order to gather their requirements regarding quality of data;Skills
Skills:
Business Analytics
Data Warehousing
Data Quality
Software and Tools knowledge
BI tools (at least one of): IBM Cognos BI, Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Qlik
Reporting (at least one of): SSRS, MicroStrategy
ETL (at least one of): SSIS, Informatica PowerCenter, IBM Datastage, Pentaho
SQL – Advanced user (Stored Procedures, Window functions, Temp Tables, Recursive Queries)
Python – Basic Automation
Knowledge (at least one of) DQ platforms is a plus: IBM WKC+DataStage, Ataccama DQ, Infomatica DQ Platform
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills and attention to details

Minimum of 4 years of experience in a data quality or data management role
Strong understanding of data quality best practices
Experience in Finance/Banking is a plus
Experience with data governance and data quality tools is a plus.

Adaptability/Flexibility
Creativity/Innovation
Decision Making/Judgment
Dependability
Initiative
Integrity/Ethics
Problem Solving/Analysis

Ability to interact with internal and external stakeholders
Ability to work under pressure
Accuracy and attention to detail
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent
